metadata.title: CVE-2020-15685 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
During the plaintext phase of the STARTTLS connection setup, protocol commands could have been injected and evaluated within the encrypted session. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.7.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
